title: Return to the Preseason level 9, level up. get ONE champion worth 90 blue essence from glorious cap
body: â€‹I thought that this had a minimum, and infact meant to be higher then the average capsule. i got a Garen champ, one skin for garen, a ward skin and 500 Orange Essence which i think is complete and utter crap. im level 10! i want to actually earn new champions to learn the game more and i get a champion shard i already own? and only one? wtf.

replies.body:
The minimum BE is 820 post level 30. Pre level 30, because the experience to level is much lower, and it is where mostly new players sit, there are lower gains and they are more geared towards obtaining accessible (noob friendly) champs. Also you got RP content for free.

The wiki has a handy chart to tell you what you'll get for each level pre 30.
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Experience_(summoner)
